text: "I Take It Back" is a song written by Buddy Buie and J. R. Cobb and performed by Sandy Posey. It reached #12 on the U.S. pop chart in 1967. It was featured on her 1967 album Sandy Posey Featuring "I Take It Back". The song was arranged by Bill McElhiney and produced by Chips Moman. The song ranked #88 on Billboard magazine's Top 100 singles of 1967. ==Other versions== *Patti Page released a version of the song on her 1967 album Today My Way. *Jeannie C. Riley released a version of the song as the B-side to her 1973 single "When Love Has Gone Away". ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:1967 singles Category:Songs written by Buddy Buie Category:Songs written by J. R. Cobb Category:Sandy Posey songs Category:Patti Page songs Category:Jeannie C. Riley songs Category:Song recordings produced by Chips Moman Category:MGM Records singles
title: I Take It Back
